csw:Record.dc:title: Mediterranean Sea - Temperature and salinity observation collection V2

csw:Record.dct:abstract:
SeaDataNet Temperature and Salinity historical data collection for the Mediterranean Sea contains all open access temperature and salinity in situ data retrieved from SeaDataNet infrastructure. The data span between -9.25 and 37 degrees of longitude, thus including an Atlantic box and Marmara Sea. It covers the time period 1900-2015. Data have been quality checked using ODV software. Quality Flags of anomalous data have been revised using basic QC procedures.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
The dataset format is ODV binary collections. You can read, analyse and export from the ODV application provided by Alfred Wegener institute at http://odv.awi.de/

csw:Record.dc:source: The data used as input for this product have been extracted from the SeadataNet Download Service: http://www.seadatanet.org/Data-Access/Common-Data-Index-CDI
